title: praNamaamyaham shree
sahitya:
praNmAmyaham s'rI gaurIsutam



phaNitalpa-vAsudEva-bhaktam satatam







anupallavi







gaNanAtha-amara-bRnda-sevitam



phaNihAra-bhooShitam munivara-vanditam







caraNam







dhRta-chAru-mOdakam gajamukham



s'ritakarAmita-garva-bhanjakam



nata-bhoota-santoShadAyakam



s'rita-bhakta-pAlakam siddhivinAyakam
